sn51.10:3.1: bahuputtaṃ cetiyaṃ → bahuputtakacetiyaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | sārandadaṃ cetiyaṃ → sārandadacetiyaṃ (sya-all); ānandacetiyaṃ (mr); sānandaraṃ (katthaci)
sn51.10:9.1: parinibbātu dāni sugato → parinibbātu sugato (bj, sya-all, km)
sn51.10:17.2: Ossaṭṭhe ca → ossaṭṭhe pana (pts-vp-pli1ed); osajje pana (mr) | devadundubhiyo → devadudrabhiyo (mr)
